divs: Sighting Detailsone night me and my friend were walking from our tree casino to the house when we stopped to look at the stars and we noiced a very bright ring of light purple lights over my trampoline (in the right of the sky) and i had no clue at all what ever it was. we were looking at it for about a minute or two then it zoomed accross the sky, faster than i had ever seen anything move in my life, to above my garage (in the left of the sky) and made a shhoo noise then when it stopped it made a low pitched beep noise. after that we were watching to see if it was going to do n e thing else then with no noise or movement just dissapeared and we didnt see anything 4 the rest of the night and i have never seen it again. it was freakin weird!! the whole time i was just amazed at the whole thing but afterwards i got this weird feeling like an akwardness but it lasted only like 2 minutes then everything was back to normal.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Vassar
There were no other sightings in Vassar on or around April 8th 2010
Summary: an exremely fast moving hen dissapearing ring of very bright light purple lights
